title: IdolClick TestSpec
description: High-level test specification for coding agent integration. Describes what to test in natural language — IdolClick compiles it to executable TestFlow.

specName.description: Human-readable name for this test specification.

targetApp.description: Target desktop application. Process name or window title.

description.description: Optional context for the LLM compiler. Helps understand the overall goal.

steps.description: Ordered list of test steps to execute.

action.description: Action type: navigate, click, type, verify, wait, scroll, hover, screenshot.

description.description: Natural language description of what to do.

expected.description: Expected outcome — the acceptance criterion for this step.

timeoutMs.description: Timeout for entire spec execution in milliseconds. 0 = default (60000ms).
